Directions: Cook noodles according to package direction's drain and place in a large bowl. Add the peas and carrots, onion, tuna and cheese. In a small bowl, combine eggs, milk and water; stir into the noodle mixture. Spoon into greased muffin cups.
Bake at 350 degrees F for 30-35 minutes or until a knife comes out clean. Cool for 5 minutes; loosen edges with a knife to remove from cups. Serve immediately.
Ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen peas and carrots, thawed
